post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait Piedmont 150 PSA 2
post_content:
Making the following T206 Cobb Green Portrait PSA 2 available. The card has great registration and deep green color and nice centering L-R. 

Asking $7250 Net or add 3% for GS - *SOLD*

No trades.

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20240729/7792bbdf4cd6f48cd0051b1c171b5f3a.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
If you change your mind on trading let me know, looking to add my first Cobb and this is exactly what I’m looking for. Good luck with the sale!

Card is SOLD
